Find Staff

For the last 16 years, Signature NURSES Inc. has helped provide staff for Kansas and Nebraksa's Medical Staffing needs.

After ten years of providing nursing services we are uniquely qualified to provide you with exceptional nurses and aides for your facility. Signature NURSES Inc. continues to ensure that every nurse and aide in the Signature NURSES Inc. network has completed a comprehensive quality assessment including:

  • Training review
  • License confirmation
  • Review of key competencies
  • Complete background check
  • Ongoing CPR and TB skin testing
  • Registered Nurses
  • Licensed Vocational Nurses
  • Certified Medication Aides
  • Certified Nurses Aides

Temporary placements for one shift, one week or to fill your monthly schedules. Signature Nurses is available 24 hours a day to help you meet your last-minute needs.

To join our Signature Nurses network, all nurses and aide candidates must undergo a thorough quality assessment that includes:

  • Training review
  • License confirmation
  • Review of key competencies
  • Complete background check
  • Ongoing CPR, TB skin testing
